snippet: Budget cuts have eliminated about 95 full-time teachers from the school district in Manchester, N.H., over the past year, swelling class sizes.
abstract: Budget cuts have eliminated about 95 full-time teachers from Manchester, NH, school district over past year, swelling class sizes; officials plan to expand virtual learning labs in district's high schools, enabling students to take courses online without support of teachers; parents are concerned that online learning could shortchange their child's educational experience.
lead_paragraph: Budget cuts have eliminated about 95 full-time teachers from the school district in Manchester, N.H., over the past year, swelling class sizes.

headline.seo: In Manchester, N.H., Struggling District’s Plans to Expand Online Classes Draws Fire
headline.main: Strapped District Plans to Add Online Classes
headline.print_headline: Strapped District Plans To Add Online Classes
